resourceTemplates.name: action-dimensions-traces
resourceTemplates.title: Traces by action and dimensions
resourceTemplates.description: Returns all traces for the specified action and two custom dimensions.

resourceTemplates.name: recent-requests
resourceTemplates.title: Recent requests
resourceTemplates.description: Shows the most recent requests with timestamp, name, URL, duration, and HTTP code.

resourceTemplates.name: recent-traces
resourceTemplates.title: Recent trace logs
resourceTemplates.description: Shows the most recent trace log entries (application logs).

resourceTemplates.name: recent-exceptions
resourceTemplates.title: Recent exceptions
resourceTemplates.description: Shows all recent exceptions with timestamp, type, and error message.

resourceTemplates.name: exception-count-by-type
resourceTemplates.title: Exception count by type (7d)
resourceTemplates.description: Returns the number of exceptions by type for the last 7 days.

resourceTemplates.name: requests-by-response-code
resourceTemplates.title: Requests by response code (7d)
resourceTemplates.description: Returns the count of requests by HTTP response code for the last 7 days.

resourceTemplates.name: slowest-requests
resourceTemplates.title: Slowest requests (7d, >1s)
resourceTemplates.description: Returns the slowest requests (over 1 second) from the last 7 days.

resourceTemplates.name: most-called-actions
resourceTemplates.title: Most called actions
resourceTemplates.description: Shows the number of traces per action (includes dynamic-cast fix).
